summary: Chat application with UI refinements: vertically aligned input area elements, reduced vertical padding in chat input area, and visually hidden message IDs (while keeping share links and URL anchoring functional).
architectural_notes: Message IDs are hidden visually but remain in the DOM for anchor links and share functionality

existing_features.title: In the chat input area (MessageInput component), vertically center-align all elements — the text input field and all action buttons — so they share the same horizontal axis.
Reduce vertical padding in the chat input area (MessageInput component) to give more vertical space to the chat messages area above it.

Visually hide message ID labels in the chat message bubbles (MessageBubble component) so they are not visible to users, while preserving their DOM presence with the correct anchor IDs so that share links and URL-based anchoring remain fully functional.
